name: Wombatus Combatus (Alpha)
description:
A happy game about murdering cane toads with Newton's second law of motion.

Controls:
Move: Arrow keys
Dig: X
Jump: Z (or SPACE/UP)
Controllers are also supported but have not been thoroughly tested. If a block gets stuck, you may be able to fix it by jumping on it.

Version 1.0.2 (29/01/2020):
Fixed enemy collisions + tweaked animations

Version 1.0.1 (28/01/2020):
Fixed ending not triggering properly

Version 1.0.0 (28/01/2020):
Initial release

Credits:
Art: Joce
Programming: Jamie
Writing: Blake
Level design: Mitch, Ewan
QA: Ewan
